text: Thank you for being patient with  us. We were so late yet the groomer is so accommodating. My cats ‘obeyed’ her so much and enjoyed the grooming. The way she talked to my cats are assuring. Thank you for your service today!!!!

Super happy with the service! Very patient and accommodating to all my requests and my dog came out super cute after! Had some matted fur and aunty helped me to comb it out so my dog can retain the fur length. Shampoo smells nice, aunty is very friendly, and the shop has homely feels. 10/10 recommended!

Location, not convenient
Clean environment
Friendly staff
Reasonable price
The groomer is very professional and give advice to pets owner

My 2 dogs went for full grooming and certain parts are bald, a hole on shoulder fur not nicely cut was unbalanced long and short was charged 25 dollars for tangle fur not properly done even after full grooming worst part is 1 of my dog ear is red got abit of blood on left ear
Did a good job at grooming and very friendly staff. Was abit late yet still accommodating
